attributes.action: stop councils using CCTV for traffic enforcement in London
attributes.additional_details:
All over the UK (and especially in London), Councils are using the motorist as a cash cow. This has to stop

Cameras are constantly being erected to fine motorists for stopping in the wrong place and many councils are making Pay and Display happen until 8/10pm in the evening and soon in Westminster on Sundays. Where will this stop and what will be next ?



Action :

-ban the use of CCTV cameras apart from bus lane enforcement / where it is impossible to patrol

-make the parking rules the same all over the country (an example : Sunday & bank hols free on all single red/yellow lines) without exception.

-fix a maximum of £100/car for a parking permit for a UK household to park outside your house (where applicable). Also, a max of £2/hr for parking charges in towns.
